author: Darrell Etherington
title: NASA issues agency-wide crowdsourcing call for ideas around COVID-19 response
description: There’s crowdsourcing a problem, and then there’s crowdsourcing a problem within NASA, where some of the smartest, most creative and resourceful problem-solvers in the world solve real-world challenges daily as part of their job. That’s why it’s uplifting to …
